title: Looking for low grade t206 cobb bat off
author: bbcard1

posts.post_title: Looking for low grade t206 cobb bat off
posts.post_content: there are several on ebay right now, but before I jump into the fray, i wanted to see if anyone had a presentable low grade raw or slabbed cobb bat off (1 or 2) that they are selling. Would just as soon deal on the board.
